activities: Stampin' Up! is a direct sales company which offers products used for home decor, greeting cards, craft projects and scrapbooking.  Information related to Stampin' Up! independent consultants is collected and used to process commission payments and manage the the overall relationship between the company and the independent consultant.  Independent consultant customer information may also be used to assess general business trends and activity.  Human resource data will be used to for general employee management and administration.
eucountries: Austria, France, Germany, Netherlands, United Kingdom
